text:
@SpeakerPelosi I’ve asked my 2 Republican senators to pass #HerosAct several times and will continue to ask them to DO THE RIGHT THING FOR CONSTITUENTS, FIRST RESPONDERS, LOCAL GOVERNMENTS and STATES. 

With their lack of action #RepublicansAreKillingUs #COVID19
